articles.title: OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever announces rival AI start-up - Financial Times
articles.description: Safe Superintelligence Inc to focus on safety and comes a month after star researcher quit the ChatGPT maker
articles.content: OpenAIs co-founder Ilya Sutskever is starting a rival AI start-up focused on building safe superintelligence, just a month after he quit the AI company following an unsuccessful coup attempt against … [+3291 chars]

articles.content:
Bankers were adamant Golden Goose, the maker of the 500 distressed-look trainers favoured by Taylor Swift, was ready to become a public company.

articles.title: US judge ends Exxon lawsuit against shareholder over climate activism - Financial Times
articles.description: A divisive case over climate change and shareholder rights winds down after shareholder agrees to drop effort
articles.content:
A US judge has dismissed ExxonMobils lawsuit against an activist shareholder who challenged the oil majors climate change risks, capping a stand-off with environmentalists and giant pension funds.
